content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1561037505426{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1524564345004{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”13177″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”PLATEFORME B2B CDISCOUNT” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:35px|text_align:center|color:%23303030|line_height:40px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1568300011214{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1568300020623{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}” el_class=”suppr_marge_mobile”]

Connectez votre business à la plateforme B2B de Cdiscount pour automatiser vos échanges de documents commerciaux et suivre leurs traitements.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1567757711972{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1561037263220{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1570460057197{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Echanges EDI avec Cdiscount

 

Vous souhaitez automatiser vos échanges commerciaux avec Cdiscount depuis votre Système d’Information ?

 

La connexion à la plateforme B2B Cdiscount fait partie de notre catalogue B2Apps existants sur la plateforme Orchestrade.

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”13178″ img_size=”full” onclick=”link_image”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1570459985105{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 40px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Parmi les messages EDI déjà pris en charge par la plateforme numérique B2B Orchestrade :

 

♦   Commande EDI ORDERS D96A

 

♦   Avis d’expédition EDI DESADV D96A

 

♦   Factures EDI INVOIC D96A

[/vc_column_text]

Connectez-vous avec vos partenaires du secteur E-commerce
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1567754961607{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 5px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 5px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e2e2e2 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e2e2e2 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e2e2e2 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e2e2e2 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;border-radius: 2px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Contactez-nous” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:25px|text_align:center|color:%23e45e1d|line_height:35px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1567754939525{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Pour l’automatisation de vos échanges EDI avec Cdiscount.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:20px|text_align:center|color:%23e45e1d|line_height:25px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1568300126398{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

    [vc_single_image image=”13015″ img_size=”full” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1559633030833{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #e8e8e8 !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1539607620181{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
